content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No compound structures have been successfully created by the agent thus far. Although several steps attempted to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for research purposes, none were successfully crafted or placed. The agent did reference existing furnace entities during smelting operations (one furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and one copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)), but these were pre‐existing and not built as part of a compound structure.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Issues with get_entities:
 – Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments or positional parameters when invoking get_entities. Verify the function’s signature and use only allowed arguments.

• Lab Placement and Retrieval Failures:
 – Before iterating over or filtering retrieved lab entities, confirm that the returned value is not None.
 – Ensure that the required lab item is available in the inventory prior to attempting placement, to prevent placement errors.

• Lab Crafting Shortfalls:
 – Satisfy all sub-ingredient requirements (such as iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) before initiating lab crafting.
 – Verify that the available resources or downstream production steps (e.g., smelting and intermediate crafting) can supply the necessary components for lab assembly.
